meanings.definition: relating to a territory or territories
meanings.sent1: The map showed the different territorials regions clearly.
meanings.sent2: The territorial boundaries were clearly marked on the map.
meanings.sent3: The territorials dispute over the land was finally resolved.
meanings.sent4: The territorial claims were like lines drawn in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The territorials nature of the conflict was evident to all.

meanings.definition: a member of a territorial army
meanings.sent1: The territorials were called to duty during the emergency.
meanings.sent2: The territorial was proud to serve in the army.
meanings.sent3: The territorials gathered for their training exercises.
meanings.sent4: The territorial stood ready to defend their homeland.
meanings.sent5: The territorials were well-prepared for any situation.

meanings.definition: pertaining to territorial behavior or instincts
meanings.sent1: The dog's territorials instincts were evident when it protected its yard.
meanings.sent2: The territorial behavior of the cat showed when it marked its territory.
meanings.sent3: The territorials display of dominance was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The territorial nature of the lion was striking to observe.
meanings.sent5: The territorials behavior was a clear sign of its instincts.
